author: Vertyco
description: Bot Arena - Build and battle robots! A recreation of the classic Bot Arena 3 flash game with real-time rendered battle videos.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any private data about users.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Bot Arena!

Get started with `[p]botarena` to view the game hub.
New players will see a tutorial and receive starter parts.

Play through the Campaign, build bots, and challenge others in PvP!
